scripts.test:browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.browserstack.config.js
scripts.test:local:browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.local.browserstack.config.js
scripts.postinstall: npm run setup:husky && npm update browserstack-node-sdk
scripts.setup:husky: node -e "try { (await import('husky')).default() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" --input-type module
scripts.setup:husky-browserstack: browserstack-node-sdk node -e "try { (await import('husky')).default() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" --input-type module
scripts.test-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:browserstack-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.browserstack.config.js
scripts.test:local-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.local.config.js
scripts.test:local:debug-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.local.config.js --debug
scripts.test:local:browserstack-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.local.browserstack.config.js
scripts.test:govuk:local-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.govuk.browserstack.config.js
scripts.test:govuk:cloud-browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.govuk.browserstack.cloud.config.js
